title: Embroidery: Counted Stitches, 19th century
medium: Colored silks on canvas.  Silk plain cloth backing.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Design of pink and blue morning glories with green leaves, arranged on stems growing form ends of strip towards the center.  Bound and lined with ivory silk.  Worked in tent stitch.

tombstone.epitaph: Embroidery: Counted Stitches, 19th century.Colored silks on canvas.  Silk plain cloth backing.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-28.
